Uses of Interface
observer.Subject

  • Packages that use Subject 
    Package Description
    canal  
    canal.observer  
    captor.impl  
    client  
    diffusion  
    ihm.observer  

    • Uses of Subject in canal

      Classes in canal that implement Subject 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Canal
      Canal is implementing all proxy interfaces.

    • Uses of Subject in canal.observer

      Subinterfaces of Subject in canal.observer 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  CaptorAsync
      CaptorAsync is an interface used as proxy for Displays.

    • Uses of Subject in captor.impl

      Classes in captor.impl that implement Subject 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CaptorMonitor
      CaptorMonitor encapsulates the captor mState and offers methods to get it through CaptorOriginator.

    • Uses of Subject in client

      Classes in client that implement Subject 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DisplayMonitor
      DisplayMonitor encapsulates the monitor state and offers methods to get it or modify it.

    • Uses of Subject in diffusion

      Subinterfaces of Subject in diffusion 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  Diffusion
      Diffusion is the strategy interface of diffusion algorithm.
      Classes in diffusion that implement Subject 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AtomicDiffusion
      AtomicDiffusion notify all observers that a new value is available once execute method is called.
      class  SequentialDiffusion
      SequentialDiffusion call update on all mObservers only when all of them have received the last one.
      class  VersionDiffusion
      SequentialDiffusion call update on all mObservers as soon as possible.

    • Uses of Subject in ihm.observer

      Subinterfaces of Subject in ihm.observer 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  SubjectMonitor
      SubjectMonitor is an interface used by DisplayMonitor in order to be observed by DisplayMonitor
